edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.hid

Class DPad

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.hid.DPad
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RioDpad, SbcDpad

    public abstract class DPad
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents a D-Pad from and XBox controller.
